login.needUser: You need to have a user on cachetur.no. Even though we're connected to geocaching.com, you need to create a new user here before you can sign in.
login.tripPlannerInfo: Cachetur.no is a trip planning tool for geocachers (you still have to plan the trips yourself). Cachetur.no is not a personal geocaching database tool (like GSAK). If a trip planner is what you're looking for, and you haven't already registered,
login.freeAccountInfo: It is entirely free to create an account and use cachetur.no, but you must have an account at geocaching.com before you can use cachetur.no.
login.premiumInfo: To take full advantage of cachetur.no, you need to be a premium member at geocaching.com.
login.readMore: Read more and watch an introductory video here
